title: Yogism - Dawson St
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Take-out, European
description: Health cafe and frozen yogurt shop with 2 locations in the city; this one sits opposite Stephen's Green. Offers vegan pancakes and other breakfast food including granola bowls, porridge, and chia seed bowl -- all can be made with house-made coconut yogurt instead of dairy when you ask. Has vegan smoothies, coffee with coconut milk or almond milk, selection of vegan treats, dairy-free frozen yogurt. Relaxed setting with rustic wooden furniture.
